A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It is unreal they could get away with this.

Most of you don't get it. I was 11 when I saw the original Star Wars. Back then we had no cell phones or even VCR's. We had to wait for repeats on TV to see something again. The 6 million dollar man captured my mind for those of you that remember that show. So way way back then I saw Star Wars. Luke and Obi was integrated into my imagination. That was 1977. ESB and RTJ over 8 years was unreal.

I am not good enough with writing skills to put a note here on bad this movie is. On every level I felt betrayed. I was stunned when I walked out of the theater. I so wish I did not see this movie so that I could have held onto my dreams as a child. 

What a complete slaughter of the franchise. Other reviews say it better than I can. 

Luke was so bad in the film not sure what to do with it. Force projection bs. He looked and acted like a homeless person in downtown LA. 

Leia floating in space.. Please people just kill her or accidentally lose her somewhere...  Why would you have her float through space ? Perhaps DC should put her in the next Justice League since she can fly in space.

Poe wow take what should have been a mans man in Han and make he a total wimp

Snoke - Why even bother

Rea - Please people this chick never earned the right to be a Jedi. Millennial bs. Everyone gets a trophy.

Luke was suppose to bring balance. 


At 52 I am a grown man and realize a few things at my age. There is no real god. At least not on earth and never has been. Falling in love is for 15-25 year olds and our repressive government continues to grow every day as our freedoms shrink. 

I am in a mild depression about this but I will get over it. I will no longer see anymore SW movies. I am going to recreate in my mind what the movie should have been. It all I can do.


What a mess. No charm\, No reason to see a 9th movie.
